data.value: Finally. I've been told to assist you.
Looks like creator of this simulation did not implement any way to end it.
Sorry about that. Anyway, this is the end. Or beginning of eternity if you look it like that.
Iridan Collective AI core is somewhere down there.
Our troops will help you with surface assault but can't follow you deeper.
They've been thrown to fighting from whatever life they had. Please try to keep some of them alive.
You can choose your landing site near Iridan tech laboratories or communications relay.
There's bound to some mining activity there too. Iridans use shitload of resources.

data.hitDescription: Electrical surge emanates from lock and hits {target}.
data.deflectDescription: Electrical surge emanates from lock and hits {target} with no effect.
data.missDescription: Electrical surge emanates from lock narrowly missing {target}.

data.hitDescription: Laser beam shoots from ceiling and hits {target}.
data.deflectDescription: Laser beam shoots from ceiling and hits {target} with no effect.
data.missDescription: Laser beam shoots from ceiling narrowly missing {target}.

data.hitDescription: Pulse of plasma shoots from ceiling and hits {target}.
data.deflectDescription: Pulse of plasma shoots from ceiling and hits {target} with no effect.
data.missDescription: Pulse of plasma shoots from ceiling narrowly missing {target}.

data.description: Your virus infiltrates Iridan communications network.

items.name: Assault pod to tech laboratories area
Assault pod to communications relay area

data.description: It appears to control energy fences in this room.
